alert.note: Alert for Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:43PM CST until March 05 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HENRY AND PETTIS COUNTIES... At 743 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sedalia to near Windsor to near Lowry City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Windsor, Green Ridge, Deepwater, Coal, Hughesville, Brownington, Tightwad, Sedalia Memorial Arpt and Truman Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
